mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM solarbill.bill_invoice_node_usage invu INNER JOIN solarbill.bill_invoice inv ON inv.id = invu.inv_id INNER JOIN solarbill.bill_account acct ON acct.id = inv.acct_id LEFT OUTER JOIN solaruser.user_node un ON un.node_id = invu.node_id AND un.user_id = acct.user_id WHERE invu.inv_id = #{invoiceId} AND invu.node_id = #{id}
